name: random-theme-switcher
description: A simple extension that randomly choose a theme

commands.title: Random Theme: Switch to a Random Theme
Random Theme: Copy all installed themes in settings
Random Theme: Add current theme to settings
Random Theme: Remove current theme from settings

randomThemeSwitcher.switchInterval.title: switch interval
randomThemeSwitcher.switchInterval.description: Interval in minutes for switching theme automatically. Don't forget to set [switchMode](#randomThemeSwitcher.switchMode) to `interval`

randomThemeSwitcher.themeList.title: theme list
randomThemeSwitcher.themeList.description: List of themes from which a random one is selected, to populate use the command 'copy installed themes'

randomThemeSwitcher.switchMode.title: switch mode
enumDescriptions: When active it will change theme whenever vscode is opened
When active it will change theme once a day
When active it will change theme every `randomThemeSwitcher.switchInterval` minutes
When active it will change theme every times a keyboard key is pressed
randomThemeSwitcher.switchMode.description: Set whether switch automatically the theme at vscode startup, or at daily basis.`nRemember to reload VSC in order to apply the settings

randomThemeSwitcher.lastSwitchDay.title: last switch day
randomThemeSwitcher.lastSwitchDay.markdownDescription: Last switch day of the week (used in the [switchMode](#randomThemeSwitcher.switchMode) `daily`)

randomThemeSwitcher.preventReloadThemeLi.title: prevent reload theme list
randomThemeSwitcher.preventReloadThemeLi.description: Some themes, after they are applied, reload the instance. If they are present in this list the extension will not set a new random theme after they are applied.
